---
title: "Cycle_diversity"
output: html_document
---

```{r cars}
library(ggplot2)
seqs <- tibble::tribble(
~barcode,
"AACGAACTCGT",
"AAGACGCGACT",
"ACGAATACGCA",
"GCTTGGTCCAA",
"CGACGTCCGTT",
"CGGATTGCTGA",
"CTTACCAATTA",
"CCTCTGATACT",
"TTGGTAGCTGA",
"TTGGAGGCGCG"
)

bases <- purrr::map(seqs, ~ str_split(.x, ""))
bases <- purrr::dmap(bases, unlist) %>% mutate(cycle = rep(1:11, 10))

ggplot(bases, aes(cycle)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = barcode))
ggsave("cycle_diversity.pdf")
```
